title: i get that some people camp lanes to get their laner ahead but this is just ridiculous
body:
i just got out or a ranked game that was literally the most unfun thing i have ever experienced in this game ever i was on the blue side (i think idk) playing riven top vs a rumble, something tells me he and his jglr was premade because since the start of the game (first blood even) his jglr kept comming top over and over again, he didn't gank any other lanes AT ALL never even left top side of the map, my jglr forgot smite and was behind and couldnt help much she tried when she could tho but the enemy xin had more presence and was stronger than her. 
It got to a point when i died to them and was walking back to my lane they were hiding in the bush behind the tower and killed me again, the next time i spawned i warded the bush and they were still there and almost killed me again i barely made it out and they would not move they were there for a good 3 minutes, making me unable to even get to my lane to cs and if rumble was top farming, xin was still there or at least somewhere around top this happened the entire game. i lost lane, i was behind in levels i was behind in cs my mid and jglr tried to help as much as they could but as i said my jglr was smiteless and behind and my mid was having a hard time against annie anyways so mid ended up losing tower trying to help me. i get why people camp ok, i dont have problems with an occasional camper but when it gets to the point of never leaving the general area of my lane, constant tower dives, sitting in the bush spawn killing me, thats just toxicity at that point and should honestly be punishable.

replies.body: Sounds like a terrible strategy. If your jungler hadn't fucked up and forgotten smite, it would have been an easy win.

So a top laner was worried about being losing lane and the jungler camped them... And your own jungler made mistakes and was ineffective. 

I don't see what the problem is. How is that possibly toxic?
No that is still strategy and perfectly allowed. Sorry it happened.

well if riot allows rage inducing toxic gameplay like this but then permabans anyone thats human and has the nerve to get upset in ridiculous situations like this...then i dont think i want any part in this game anymore honestly its not as fun as it use to by, i might take a break from it or quit altogether

btw i didnt rage or flame anyone (im surprised i kept my cool honestly) but i know for a fact if i gave xin a piece of my mind about his toxic strategy i would be permabanned faster than i could type "kys"

> [{quoted}](name=Hells bellsX,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1KNUdK8R,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-12-31T00:48:16.430+0000)
>
> well if riot allows rage inducing toxic gameplay like this but then permabans anyone thats human and has the nerve to get upset in ridiculous situations like this...then i dont think i want any part in this game anymore honestly its not as fun as it use to by, i might take a break from it or quit altogether

w a t
How is that toxic game play? That is strategy. The goal is to throw you off balance, to tip the game into their favor. Sounds like it worked exceptionally well, too.
so if i were to bm and say toxic things to the enemy team to tilt them, can i get away with it because its a strategy?

You realize how stupid things just got when you went towards the speech strategy? Do you see the sensitivity of these adults? You cannot pull real life strategy into this game, otherwise these adults will throw a fit and punish you.

No, that is not what I am saying. If you watch any sport, they tend to play to the weakest side of the opposing team. That is the case here, they camped the shit out of you, you got beat, and it sucked. Plain and simple, they played the game, and out matched your team (including you). It always sucks to be on the receiving end of these types of games, but there is nothing against the rules about it.

If you are harassing the enemy team, that is not playing the game. Sure you can give a ;-) whenever they miss a big skill shot or ult, or possibly give them a laugh or emote when you get a double under their tower, but that is not the same as calling them names and trying to harass them into tilting.

I repeat, it sucks that you had a really bad game, but those happen. Move on, and get on to the next one.

Do you realize what you are saying ?
**
There isn't a rule that forbid you to gank someone over and over in this game, it's a valid strategy and ganking to snowball a lane is part of the game.
There is a rule that forbid you to say toxic things to the enemy.**

You got mad because someone kept ganking you...
I get that you got pissed because of it, but if you want you can play jungle and do the exact same thing, nobody will report you for that.

I'm gonna quote a post from a jungler found on this forum :

>If I camp top, we destroy the top laner over and over again it allows me to invade more freely into the enemy topside jungle and means we basically just removed the enemy top laner from the game allowing us to make moves elsewhere and effectibly removing half the other junglers jungle.

Like i told you before, instead of making a forum post saying "the jungler kept ganking me so he should be punished", you could have asked for advices like "What can i do when the jungler keeps ganking my lane over and over ?"
I'm telling you this situation will happen to you again, all you need to do is find ways to play around it, it's not that hard, like i told you before, let your T1 turret die and go gank another lane, go steal the enemy jungle camps, play safe and buy defensive items, or items with an active that slows enemies so you can run away...

I have been in this situation before too, a lot of people have been in this same exact situation too, you have to learn how to deal with it instead of saying that they shouldn't be allowed to gank you over and over.

Do you realize that it's not that big of a deal ? Let say the midlaner did the same exact same thing, would you make a forum post saying "I've been ganked by the enemy midlaner over and over this game, i think midlaners shoudn't be able to gank more than 10 times in a game, they should be punished if they come gank another lane more than 10 times !!!"

I'm sure that if you were in a game where your jungler came top and helped you kill your enemy over and over you'll be more than happy and you'll honor that jungler...

Think of it like corner camping in CoD. Annoying as hell but not against the rules. 

And it would really depend on how you went about it. Something like "This is getting annoying Xin." or "At least buy me dinner if you are going to stay here." Would most likely be acceptable.

I played a lot of jungle and let me clue you in ... I camp Riven , Yas , Fiora , Zoe , AKali and Zed. The players who play those get really tilted usually and spout something like: 

"Gotta 2v1 me"
"Can't do anything without jumping me"
"1v1 me" 

So I just keep camping the crap out of them because I know they'll tilt then tilt their team for me.

How can you say something like that ? I mean you can't punish people because they keeps ganking you, it's like saying "This dude was 20/0/5 and killed me 20 times !!! i want him to be punished because he killed me too many times !!!"

I get it might be frustrating but if he wants to do that he can, and you have to deal with it, i'm sure there is multiple ways you can win even if their jungler keeps ganking you, you just have to figure it out.

If you put yourself in the jungler mind, maybe ganking the same lane over and over to snowball and win the game that way is a valid strategy, it might be an "off meta" strategy but maybe they won that way.

>well if riot allows rage inducing toxic gameplay like this but then permabans anyone thats human and has the nerve to get upset in ridiculous situations like this...

I've been in similar situations before and i wasn't being toxic because of it, if you can't get to your lane and cs, maybe go invade the enemy jungle, go steal all his camps, so yeah you have to play safe, get defensive stats, maybe a GA, zhonya, any item that can slow them while you run away, get safe, maybe just abandon your T1 turret and go gank other lanes....

There are solutions against this strategy, and in this game you have to be prepared to have sometimes games where you have to 1v2 most of the time, you just gotta deal with it, take it as training for the next time it happens.
